summary: Assistant Manager with extensive luxury retail experience, including team leadership, inventory control, sales reporting, and event planning for product launches and corporate events.

experience.title: Assistant Manager
experience.description: Manage an $8.4 million volume luxury shoe sales floor; Recruit, train, develop, and manage a team of 15 to meet and exceed sales goals; Communicate weekly with buying office to maximize market-specific product assortment; Plan and execute events such as product launches, product knowledge trainings, corporate events, client luncheons, charity events; Fulfill management responsibilities including store opening/closing procedures, direct sales floor activities, assisting customers, input and prepare sales reports daily, inventory control.

experience.title: Sales Associate - Designer & Salon Shoes
experience.description: Competitive drive to succeed in a commission-based environment; Maintained constant client communication and excelled in providing customer service; Demonstrated in-depth knowledge of product and current market trends to meet customer needs.

experience.title: Sales Associate & Key
experience.description: Responsibility of shipping and receiving; Create incentives to drive key business objectives and motivate sales team; Manage and conduct inventories.

experience.title: Assistant VP
experience.description: Managed details of conference calls, travel arrangements and meetings, itineraries, expense reports, sample garments; Collaborated with buying office concerning availability of product, shipping and delivery dates, and pricing.

education.school: Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising
